name: Duoc Nguyen
tagline: Pi-shaped engineer: Backend/AI tooling × AI agents/MCP × Product iteration
bio: Engineering Manager at FireGroup, building e-commerce platforms at scale.
I care about shipping products that solve real problems. My approach: start with code, iterate with users, refine with data.
Created aiocean.io to experiment with AI-first developer tools. Write about engineering and product thinking at 12bit.vn and onepercent.plus.
Helped build Vue.js Vietnam community in 2016. Active in open source with 1.8K+ stars across 435+ repos.
Main languages: Go and TypeScript. Focus areas: backend systems, AI tooling, MCP servers, real-time architectures.
Side projects include Obsidian Open Gate (222★), Jira MCP (79★), and various developer tools that make AI integration seamless.
Based in Vietnam. Always exploring the intersection of AI agents and developer productivity.
now: Building vite-plugin-ai-annotator for AI-powered code modifications
Enhancing research-kit workflows for spec-driven development
